sentence.Network_en: Travel had not mellowed him appreciably.
sentence.Network_cn: 游历并未使他明显成熟。

sentence.Network_en: Summer temperatures are appreciably more comfortable there.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里夏天的气温明显舒服得多。

sentence.Network_en: The index adds appreciably to the usefulness of the book.
sentence.Network_cn: 索引明显地增加了这本书的实用价值.

PerfectNetExp.abs: appreciable 可感知的appreciably 略微appreciate 赏识
略微有一点例句与用法 1. The limit occurs when the ordinate deviates appreciably from unity .这个限度发生在纵坐标明显地从单位1偏离的时候。 2.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... precious a 珍贵的 appreciate v 评价；欣赏 appreciative a 有欣赏力的.
九年级英语单词表 ... suppor 支持；帮组 appreciate 感激 donation 捐赠物；捐赠.
金融词汇 - 豆丁网 ... Appeals panel 上诉委员会 Appreciation [财产] 增值；涨价 Appropriation 拨款；经费；指拨金额.
商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... yield 产量收益,收益率 increase in value,appreciation 增值,升值 duty 税.

entry.tran: 可觉察的；相当大的；明显的
entry.def: An appreciable amount or effect is large enough to be important or clearly noticed.

example.ex: It contains less than 1 per cent fat, an appreciable amount of protein, and a high content of minerals...
example.tran: 它所含脂肪不到1%，富含蛋白质，矿物质含量也很高。

example.ex: This has not had an appreciable effect on production.
example.tran: 此事未对生产造成显著影响。

auth_sentence.content: Nor, with the exception of too many late-night Chinese deliveries, do our bodies become appreciably larger or smaller.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor, with the exception of too many late-night Chinese deliveries, do our bodies become appreciably larger or smaller.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor, with the exception of too many late-night Chinese deliveries, do our bodies become appreciably larger or smaller.

auth_sentence.content: It is said the water was purified in a few minutes, without appreciably increasing its temperature.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is said the water was purified in a few minutes, without appreciably increasing its temperature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is said the water was purified in a few minutes, without appreciably increasing its temperature.

auth_sentence.content: We sort of try to be a little conservative to not appreciably age too deep in history.
auth_sentence.res_content: We sort of try to be a little conservative to not appreciably age too deep in history.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We sort of try to be a little conservative to not appreciably age too deep in history.
